name: Software at Scale 58 - Measuring Developer Productivity with Abi Noda
summary: Listen now (49 min) | Abi Noda is the CEO and co-founder of DX, a developer productivity platform. Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google Podcasts My view on developer experience and productivity measurement aligns extremely closely with DX’s view. The productivity of a group of engineers cannot be measured by tools alone - there’s too many qualitative factors like cross-functional stakeholder beuracracy or inefficiency, and inherent domain/codebase complexity that cannot be measured by tools.
